Others: Belgium lost 1-0 to Slovakia in their opening Euro 2024 group game.
Romelu Lukaku had several chances but missed them, leading to frustration among Belgian fans.
Lukaku's performance was disappointing, especially considering his history and importance to Belgium's attack.
VAR ruled out a potential equalizer for Belgium due to offside and handball by a substitute player.
Belgium's remaining group games are against Romania and Ukraine.
